title: The Rain forest

Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
description: Filmed in the McPherson Ranges in southern Queensland, capturing the watery atmosphere, eerie sounds, fragile plants and delicate patterns of light which penetrate the dense foliage. The main highlight is a vast camp of flying foxes hanging from the palms, fanning themselves with extended wing membrane.
